channel.title: Project 06 - What We Love
channel.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img] [b]Combat[/b]
[ul][li]PvP fully complete[/li] [li]PvN fully complete[/li] [li]Perfect max hit formulas[/li] [li]Perfect accuracy formula[/li] [li]Equipment requirements[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HhYtx.gif[/img] [b]Magic[/b]
[ul][li]Every modern combat spell[/li] [li]Can't mage through walls[/li] [li]Alching[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/C2xH2.gif[/img] [b]Ranged[/b]
[ul][li]Bows/arrows[/li] [li]Can't shoot through walls[/li] [li]Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal)[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img] [b]Prayer[/b]
[ul][li]All bones bury-able[/li] [li]Every prayer working properly[/li] [li]Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img] [b]Mining[/b]
[ul][li]Emptying and refilling rocks[/li] [li]All ores can be mined[/li] [li]Correct pickaxe finding and animations[/li] [li]Prospecting[/li] [li]Random chance of obtaining gems[/li] [li]Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img] [b]Smithing[/b]
[ul][li]All bars can be made[/li] [li]All bars can be forged into items[/li] [li]All equipment can be produced[/li] [li]Correct animations, interfaces and objects used[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img] [b]Fishing[/b]
[ul][li]All fish can be caught[/li] [li]Big net fishing[/li] [li]Correct item requirements[/li] [li]Fishing spots located all around the world[/li] [li]Correct animations[/li] [li]Moving fishing locations[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img] [b]Cooking[/b]
[ul][li]Picking wheat[/li] [li]Filling flour bin[/li] [li]Bread[/li] [li]Pizza[/li] [li]Cakes[/li] [li]Potatoes[/li] [li]Eating food (in pieces)[/li] [li]Correct animation and timing used[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img] [b]Woodcutting[/b]
[ul][li]Stumps and regrowing trees[/li] [li]Correct hatchet finding[/li] [li]Correct hatchet animations[/li] [li]All trees cut-able[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img] [b]Firemaking[/b]
[ul][li]All logs light able[/li] [li]Adding and depleting of lightened logs[/li] [li]Ashes appear after logs burn out[/li] [li]Correct animations[/li] [li]Clipped[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img] [b]Crafting[/b]
[ul][li]Leather crafting[/li] [li]Full tanning[/li] [li]Pottery (fired and unfired)[/li] [li]Gem cutting[/li] [li]Jewellry making[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img] [b]Runecrafting[/b]
[ul][li]All altars working[/li] [li]Correct multiple crafting[/li] [li]Talismans "pull" to altars[/li] [li]Tiaras enchanting[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/R4MMI.png[/img] [b]Music and Sounds[/b]
[ul][li]All skilling sounds[/li] [li]Various attacking sounds[/li] [li]Music on region of player[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img] [b]Quests[/b]
[ul][li]Cook's Assistant[/li] [li]Tutorial Island[/li][/ul]
[b]Media.[/b] [i]coming[/i]

item.title: Project 06 - What We Love
item.dc:creator: @Ares1 Ares_
item.description:

item.title: Project 06 - What We Love
item.dc:creator: @Bells1 Bells
item.description:
@Bells1 wrote:

Combat

[ul][li]PvP fully complete[/li]
[li]PvN fully complete[/li]
[li]Perfect max hit formulas[/li]
[li]Perfect accuracy formula[/li]
[li]Equipment requirements[/li][/ul]

Magic

[ul][li]Every modern combat spell[/li]
[li]Can’t mage through walls[/li]
[li]Alching[/li][/ul]

Ranged

[ul][li]Bows/arrows[/li]
[li]Can’t shoot through walls[/li]
[li]Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal)[/li][/ul]

Prayer

[ul][li]All bones bury-able[/li]
[li]Every prayer working properly[/li]
[li]Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate[/li][/ul]

Mining

[ul][li]Emptying and refilling rocks[/li]
[li]All ores can be mined[/li]
[li]Correct pickaxe finding and animations[/li]
[li]Prospecting[/li]
[li]Random chance of obtaining gems[/li]
[li]Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms[/li][/ul]

Smithing

[ul][li]All bars can be made[/li]
[li]All bars can be forged into items[/li]
[li]All equipment can be produced[/li]
[li]Correct animations, interfaces and objects used[/li][/ul]

Fishing

[ul][li]All fish can be caught[/li]
[li]Big net fishing[/li]
[li]Correct item requirements[/li]
[li]Fishing spots located all around the world[/li]
[li]Correct animations[/li]
[li]Moving fishing locations[/li][/ul]

Cooking

[ul][li]Picking wheat[/li]
[li]Filling flour bin[/li]
[li]Bread[/li]
[li]Pizza[/li]
[li]Cakes[/li]
[li]Potatoes[/li]
[li]Eating food (in pieces)[/li]
[li]Correct animation and timing used[/li][/ul]

Woodcutting

[ul][li]Stumps and regrowing trees[/li]
[li]Correct hatchet finding[/li]
[li]Correct hatchet animations[/li]
[li]All trees cut-able[/li][/ul]

Firemaking

[ul][li]All logs light able[/li]
[li]Adding and depleting of lightened logs[/li]
[li]Ashes appear after logs burn out[/li]
[li]Correct animations[/li]
[li]Clipped[/li][/ul]

Crafting

[ul][li]Leather crafting[/li]
[li]Full tanning[/li]
[li]Pottery (fired and unfired)[/li]
[li]Gem cutting[/li]
[li]Jewellry making[/li][/ul]

Runecrafting

[ul][li]All altars working[/li]
[li]Correct multiple crafting[/li]
[li]Talismans “pull” to altars[/li]
[li]Tiaras enchanting[/li][/ul]

Music and Sounds

[ul][li]All skilling sounds[/li]
[li]Various attacking sounds[/li]
[li]Music on region of player[/li][/ul]

Quests

[ul][li]Cook’s Assistant[/li]
[li]Tutorial Island[/li][/ul]

Media.
coming
